message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $800000 to $900000. I would like to make a counteroffer at $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to get at least $975000 for the product. Can we discuss this further?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I am still working within my budgetary constraints and am not able to increase my offer. I would like to make one final counteroffer at $925000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $980000 for the product. Can we meet at $975000, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal?

I appreciate your effort to reach a compromise, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must adhere to my budgetary limits. I am unable to agree to the proposed price of $975000. I am willing to pay no more than $925000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
